multichains.des: ChainCloud is a platform that can help you to connect your website or application with the most popular blockchain assets (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin and so on).

users.RenRenBit: RenRenBit is currently the largest Bitcoin OTC platform , quick independent operation Bitcoin transactions , the sale of real-time arrival , and convenient. Widely praised by insiders.
users.BTC 123: BTC123 is a comprehensive information site navigation . Included excellent website about bitcoin , bitcoins provide real-time quotes , price K line , as well as related data query , information, information is one of the industry's most popular Bitcoin website.

features.Cold Receiving API_des: You can use this API to monitoring all your Cold Receiving addresses.
features.Cross Chain Exchange_des: HSM means Hardware Security Module. We have specially designed two HSM modules to construct unbreakable secured blockchain cloud platform.
